name: Promotion Class: Fanatic
description:
Role: Ranged Damage

Known for wild gestures and speaking in tongues, this devotee of fire only desires to set the unworthy ablaze before the strain of casting spells causes them to burn out.

Stat Adjustments:
Fire Damage +3%
Attack Power +225

Traits Granted:
Book Mastery

Enhancements:
Fervor: Now adds damage bonus to basic attacks for 12 seconds.
Fire Tornadoes: Now tornadoes hit 4 times per enemy hit.
Hellfire Aura: Now with increased radius.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Fanatic promotion class and prevents access to the Sanctifier and Inquisitor promotion classes.
